title: Mushroom, garlic and fresh coriander risotto
ingredients: ['250g mushrooms, cleaned and sliced', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 stalks celery, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '300g risotto rice', '200ml white wine', '400ml chicken stock', '400ml water', 'salt and pepper to taste', '30g fresh coriander, finely chopped', 'handful grated Parmesan cheese', '1/2 lemon, juiced']
